user_instruction: 'Reply the latest email from my pan pal Emily (emily@gmail.com). You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi there,

Could you please open my Gmail and pull the most recent message from my pen pal, Emily (emily@gmail.com)? If there are any related notes or background details stored in Notion, kindly include those as well so I have the full context for my reply.

Thank you very much for your help!

final_output:
Hi there,

Could you please open my Gmail and pull the most recent message from my pen pal, Emily (emily@gmail.com)? If there are any related notes or background details stored in Notion, kindly include those as well so I have the full context for my reply.

Thank you very much for your help!
